author: ET Bureau
title: 'Karuna' to poor is answer to corona: PM Modi
description: 'Karuna' to poor is answer to corona: PM ModiEach citizen should try to help nine poor families during the 21 days of lockdown, PM Modi has said and likened the fight against the Covid-19 pandemic to the legendary Kurukshetra war that lasted 18 days.
content: New Delhi: Each citizen should try to help nine poor families during the 21 days of lockdown, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has said and likened the fight against the Covid-19 pandemic to the legendary Kurukshetra war that lasted 18 days. “Our effort is to win… [+1447 chars]
